pyecharts.charts.basic_charts.map
=================================

.. py:module:: pyecharts.charts.basic_charts.map


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   pyecharts.charts.basic_charts.map.MapMixin
   pyecharts.charts.basic_charts.map.Map


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: MapMixin

   <<< Map >>>

   Map are mainly used for visualization of geographic area data.


   .. py:method:: add(series_name: str, data_pair: pyecharts.types.Sequence[pyecharts.types.Union[pyecharts.types.Sequence, pyecharts.options.MapItem, dict]], maptype: str = 'china', *, is_roam: bool = True, center: pyecharts.types.Optional[pyecharts.types.Sequence] = None, aspect_scale: pyecharts.types.Numeric = 0.75, bounding_coords: pyecharts.types.Optional[pyecharts.types.Sequence[pyecharts.types.Numeric]] = None, min_scale_limit: pyecharts.types.Optional[pyecharts.types.Numeric] = None, max_scale_limit: pyecharts.types.Optional[pyecharts.types.Numeric] = None, name_property: str = 'name', selected_mode: pyecharts.types.Union[bool, str] = False, zoom: pyecharts.types.Optional[pyecharts.types.Numeric] = 1, name_map: pyecharts.types.Optional[dict] = None, symbol: pyecharts.types.Optional[str] = None, map_value_calculation: str = 'sum', is_map_symbol_show: bool = True, z_level: pyecharts.types.Numeric = 0, z: pyecharts.types.Numeric = 2, pos_left: pyecharts.types.Optional[pyecharts.types.Union[str, pyecharts.types.Numeric]] = None, pos_top: pyecharts.types.Optional[pyecharts.types.Union[str, pyecharts.types.Numeric]] = None, pos_right: pyecharts.types.Optional[pyecharts.types.Union[str, pyecharts.types.Numeric]] = None, pos_bottom: pyecharts.types.Optional[pyecharts.types.Union[str, pyecharts.types.Numeric]] = None, geo_index: pyecharts.types.Optional[pyecharts.types.Numeric] = None, series_layout_by: str = 'column', dataset_index: pyecharts.types.Optional[pyecharts.types.Numeric] = 0, layout_center: pyecharts.types.Optional[pyecharts.types.Sequence[str]] = None, layout_size: pyecharts.types.Union[str, pyecharts.types.Numeric] = None, label_opts: pyecharts.types.Label = opts.LabelOpts(), tooltip_opts: pyecharts.types.Tooltip = None, itemstyle_opts: pyecharts.types.ItemStyle = None, emphasis_label_opts: pyecharts.types.Label = None, emphasis_itemstyle_opts: pyecharts.types.ItemStyle = None)


.. py:class:: Map(init_opts: pyecharts.types.Init = opts.InitOpts(), render_opts: pyecharts.types.RenderInit = opts.RenderOpts())

   Bases: :py:obj:`pyecharts.charts.chart.Chart`, :py:obj:`MapMixin`


   `Base` is the root class for all graphical class, it provides
   part of the initialization parameters and common methods


   .. py:method:: add_geo_json(geo_json: dict)
